scripts.railway:build: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; echo "[Railway] Building backend"; medusa build; echo "[Railway] Building admin (admin-only)"; medusa build --admin-only || echo "[Railway] Admin build skipped or failed"; if [ -f .medusa/client/index.html ] && [ ! -f .medusa/server/public/admin/index.html ] && [ ! -f .medusa/admin/index.html ]; then echo "[Railway] Copying fallback admin build from .medusa/client to .medusa/admin"; mkdir -p .medusa/admin; cp -r .medusa/client/* .medusa/admin/ || true; fi; if [ -f .medusa/server/public/admin/index.html ] || [ -f .medusa/admin/index.html ]; then echo "[Railway] Admin build present"; else echo "[Railway] Admin build not found"; fi'
scripts.railway:start: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; export PORT=${PORT:-9000}; if [ ! -f .medusa/server/public/admin/index.html ] && [ ! -f .medusa/admin/index.html ]; then echo "[Railway] Admin build missing - disabling embedded admin"; export DISABLE_MEDUSA_ADMIN=true; fi; echo "[Railway] Running DB migrations"; npm run db:migrate; echo "[Railway] Starting Medusa on port ${PORT}"; medusa start --host 0.0.0.0 --port $PORT'
